enchantment.wisdom_enchantment.wisdom.de: Mobs will drop more XP when killed.
enchantment.persistent.persistent.desc: Causes armor and gear in a loaded chunk to take 20 minutes to despawn rather than 5.
enchantment.endlessbiomes.shared_pain.de: When a mob is killed with this weapon and more damage is dealt than necessary to kill it the excess damage will be dealt to other nearby enemies.
enchantment.betterarcheology.penetrating: Damage dealt by the enchanted weapon ignores the protection enchantment.
enchantment.betterarcheology.tunneling.d: Breaks the block that is underneath the block broken with this tool.
enchantment.betterarcheology.soaring_win: The enchanted elytra gives the wearer a small boost when taking off.
enchantment.hunters_return.bounce.desc: The enchanted boomerang will bounce more when thrown.
enchantment.galosphere.rupture.desc: Shatters the saltbound tablet's pillars into shard projectiles once they break.
enchantment.galosphere.sustain.desc: Extends the duration of the saltbound tablet's pillars.
enchantment.galosphere.enfeeble.desc: Inflicts slowness on entities hit by the saltbound tablet's pillars.
enchantment.spawnersplus.soul_stealing.d: Causes certain mobs to drop their souls when killed.
effect.habitat.prickling.description: Causes damage to enemies attacking the affected entity.
effect.galosphere.astral.description: Allows the affected player to phase through blocks.
effect.enemyexpansion.bitten.description: Causes the affected entity to burn in daylight.
effect.enemyexpansion.swift_flight.descr: An unobtainable effect used only for certain mob's abilities.
effect.netherdungeons.vampirism.descript: When the affected player kills an entity they gain a few health points.
effect.netherdungeons.durability.descrip: When being hurt the affected entity has a 25% chance to ignore all damage.
effect.netherdungeons.vulnerability.desc: Causes the affected entity to take more damage when hurt.
